entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
